categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Battle of Skorrupon, High Inquisitor Volytar was intercepted outside of his personal Star Destroyer by Rorworr, Arani Korden, and Deel Surool. The trio became known as the "heroes of Skorrupon" when they defeated Volytar, although Rorworr was left to mourn the loss of his friend, Sia-Lan Wezz.

The aforementioned "Jedi Knight" is none other than Sia-Lan Wezz. Wezz's death during the Battle of Skorrupon was established in Galactic Campaign Guide—later however, Star Wars: Purge established that she was killed by Darth Vader shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire.

Leland Chee has stated the possibility that Galactic Campaign Guide was only providing a hypothetical situation regarding the Skorrupon death, and might get noted in the Holocron Continuity Database as "One report indicated that Sia-Lan Wezz had been lost at the Battle of Skorrupon".[source?]
